website_summaries.verdict: The updated $300 price of the newly named v6 makes it stand out as one of the best stick vac buys we've tested.
pros: The Dyson v6 performs well and maneuvers easily, keeping up with more expensive Dyson stick vacs for less
cons: With only one attachment, the v6 is now feature-poor and loses to the cheaper Oreck Touch on pet hair and large particle performance

customer_reviews.title: Short lifespan!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Dyson V6 cordless vacuum 2 years ago. I was taking good care of it, it worked wonderfully, I was happy. Then the battery stopped charging. I tried new charger, nothing. Finally I bought replacement battery, installed it with some difficulty, the vacuum worked another 6 months. Now the battery stopped charging again. Let me just say, that I would expect longer lifespan for the price of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed to say that the battery life on this is ...
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to order this cord free vacuum after using one that my sister purchased (the V7). I'm so disappointed to say that the battery life on this is terrible! After charging it overnight, it only ran for 8 minutes before dying (at regular, not max suction). I charged it again for the recommended 3.5 hours to ensure that it was fully charged before attempting to use it again and it lasted longer that time but only made it 16 minutes before it died. I may try to purchase the V7 and see if it gets better results but the V6 is just not going to cut it.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: The lack of cord was nice but it just wasn’t enough power for families
customer_reviews.text: We vacuum several times a day. 7 minutes was not long enough to vacuum what I needed - it was constantly getting clogged or losing suction and it’s just not for heavy use. The lack of cord was nice but it just wasn’t enough power for families.
customer_reviews.author: JEld

customer_reviews.title: Too bad, I heard the Dyson was excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed with this product. I had Rumba's for years and decided to change to Dyson. Worked well for a year and it died it no longer would work. When I tried to use it, it would only intermittent suck and then die.
customer_reviews.author: A simple kindness can change the world

customer_reviews.title: 1 year and it’s about useless
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for one year. No heavy cleaning. Just very light duty pick up. Now the suction is almost non existent. The motor want stay on. I paid a lot for this to have to go back and start over. And yes I’ve cleaned the filter and I keep it charged. Never use it up to 20 minutes at a time. I’m disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Wells

customer_reviews.title: Very good vacuum, not for long hair though!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great choice if you are looking for a vacuum for smaller houses/apartments. It has good pick up and runs very smoothly. The battery doesn't last the longest if you use the MAX setting, but that is clearly pointed out by Dyson, but if you don't use MAX this will last quite awhile and do a really nice job. The brush on the bottom gets clogged very fast if you or anyone in the house has long hair. This causes clogging if you don't stay dilligent on cleaning out the brush and tubes. If you are good about maintenance you will have no issues with this vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Atterberry

customer_reviews.title: Battery faded and customer service is awful
customer_reviews.text: Product worked perfectly for about 15 months. Then it stopped charging. I ran a diagnosis on Dyson's site and it showed that it needed a replacement battery. For a week now the site keeps saying that I'll be contacted within one business day or receive an e-mail with my order for a new battery, and I got neither. I tried calling, texting, online chat and e-mailing and I get no answer. Meanwhile I can't clean the house. If this was a cheap product, I'd understand, but if they want to be a "prime brand" charging the outrageous prices they do, then Dyson definitely needs to improve on its customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Danilo Palermo

customer_reviews.title: ON nooooooooooooo
customer_reviews.text: The charge only last about 10 +/- minutes, the storage location is to small have to clean it about 10 minutes then charge the system as u clean the storage
customer_reviews.author: Polly

customer_reviews.title: NOT UP TO PAR
customer_reviews.text: I waited to review this product but I finally caved. The battery on this vacuum the charge does not last very long. I can’t finish vacuuming my house in one go. I always have to put back to charge in order to finish. And to be honest it doesn’t pick up everything in one go. Somethings I have to go over it a few times in order to pick it up and at times it doesn’t suction it. Recently the vacuum when I turn it on let’s out this awful smell. This product isn’t cheap so I expected when I purchased it that I would have no problems and work as it says it should, that’s not been the case.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Reads

customer_reviews.title: DONT WASTE YOUR  MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The product is used trash. The part don't fit together (taken from multiple models and thrown in a box). I contacted the seller that the battery didn't hold a charge at all and the parts didn't fit together and they wanted to send another battery AND they want me to pay $40 for return shipping. Save your money. It's a rip off It's July 18 and I still haven't been refunded. Item returned months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Anna C

customer_reviews.title: Bad for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vacuum a while ago. It's ok I guess. It gets a max of 10 minutes per charge which isn't long enough to vacuum the 2nd floor. So you have to recharge in the middle of cleaning. Suction is ok, but I have an average carpet and it dosnt seem to have enough power to turn the brush unless you are lifting it alittle bit as to take weight off the bottom. Overall not very happy. I replaced this with a corded 75 dollar bissell which does 100x better.
customer_reviews.author: G and P Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but poor execution
customer_reviews.text: Filter clogs frequently. I have purchased 2. Thought the first wore out quickly but tried again. Having same issues with 2nd. I will not buy Dyson again. Great idea but poor execution.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Dobson

customer_reviews.title: The amount of debris this small and light weight vacuum pulled up was amazing. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how I cleaned before buying this vacuum. I thought my floors and carpets were clean, until I vacuumed with the Dyson V6. The amount of debris this small and light weight vacuum pulled up was amazing. I highly recommend this to anyone who wants a great vacuum that can handle all of your needs around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan H

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. It’s very lite weight & the perfect size. It’s perfect for bare floors. Lots of suction with 2 speeds to choose from. Just so you know if you put it on setting #2 the battery only lasts about 5 minuets. You can get a lot more vacuuming done on speed #1. I have 3 dogs & have no problem going around the house quickly with the battery charged. The wall charger is great for storing/charging.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I finally order a cordless Dyson. It so easy to just grab it whenever I need it, no longer dreading rolling out the big heavy vacuum. It’s so fall and flat that it goes under furniture easily and makes cleaning the stairs so much easier. The battery time isn’t and issue for me as I have a large house and only clean 1 area at a time. It has as much suction as any full suze vacuum and even picks up cat litter.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this vacuum. Sometimes mine will charge. When it does charge it only works 10 minutes or less. Now it will run for 1 minute or less after a full 24 hour charge. I’m sick of it. I’ve had it for less than 2 years now and I should have returned it immediately, but kept think that it would get better. It didn’t. I also have a dyson canister that vacuums okay, but the plastic lock things that hold the attachments on broke. I wouldn’t waste my money on any dyson products!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Cowen

customer_reviews.title: Its a Dyson..
customer_reviews.text: This will not replace your main vacuum. It has about 20 minutes of consistent battery use and is designed to be "quick clean up" tool. With that said, it compliments a full sized Dyson very well. In fact I suspect that owners of a full sized Dyson are the primary target consumers for this model. I have owned two of these over the past few years and it is perfect for getting the dog hair up off mexican tile floors and carpeted stairs. Easy maintenance. Anything more than quick cleanups will require multiple sessions of emptying the disposal tank. Clean the filter monthly to experience the out of the box performance for several years.
customer_reviews.author: SpyderBite

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack broken in 18 months
customer_reviews.text: Low ratings from me due to the fact that the batteries are absolute trash. Give the product 18 months and you'll need to purchase a new battery pack. From dyson, the replacement will run you about $100. Buy a cheap off-brand battery on Amazon for less than $50. This is unacceptable for such an expensive product. In contrast, my roomba is over 5 years old and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Nick D.

customer_reviews.title: Battery died after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: I had to give this one star because the vacuum was working great for two years and now the battery won't charge! I saw a few others say the same. I called Dyson and they said it was out of warrantee of course, but they could offer me a great deal on a new one! I thought by buying from a company like Dyson it would last. Now it goes in the trash???? Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: ka 12

customer_reviews.title: Great portable floor vac
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vaccuum. It is very easy to maneuver and does a great job on dog hair from our two labs. We have a wood kitchen and dining floor and this does the job quickly so on this large floor I've yet to run out of battery. I rarely use the max setting. My only complaint is replacing the canister is a little tricky but after 6 weeks I'm getting the hang of it!
customer_reviews.author: PeteF

customer_reviews.title: This thing kicks major butt!
customer_reviews.text: This is without a doubt the most awesome vacuum we've ever owned! For a battery powered vacuum it's great, but it's not just that! It kicks the butt of corded vacuums! I vacuumed the carpet using our corded vacuum which we thought still worked very well, then went behind it with the Dyson V6 and got more dirt than you can even imagine! Best money I've ever spent on a vacuum! If you don't have one, you need one!
customer_reviews.author: W. Raisch

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for daily cleanings
customer_reviews.text: I am obsessed with this vacuum and recommend it to everyone! My mother in law had one first, so I got one. I've since bought one for my mom! It is light, maneuverable, powerful and efficient. The suction never fades and the charge is long enough to get all my hard floors and some of my carpet (I have a large house). It will not replace your normal house vacuum, but it makes quick clean ups a breeze and is a dream on hard floors.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: NO WARRANTY ON MOTOR HEAD!! ONLY LAST'S SIX MONTH'S= BUY SOMETHING ELSE!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little vacuum works good, the wife loves it. The motor head quit working after six months and Dyson considers it a wear and tear item. Does not cover it under the 2 year warranty. They will sell you a motor head for $226.18. For 30 bucks more you can buy a new vacuum !! Argue with the service rep and they will replace it one time as a courtesy. Waste of money for a top name brand product that's only good for six months
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF BATTERY
customer_reviews.text: The battery burns out very quickly. And I don't mean that it looses it's charge. The battery burns out so that it CAN'T BE charged. We've been trying to contact them and are on hold for an hour before my husband slams the phone down. "We are experiencing a high volume of calls." Yeah, probably all about the battery. The warranty is off soon and we need to get this resolved soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Rosalind

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Factory service is not crap. The idea of me driving two hours to drop off at a service center when you can just send a call tag is ludicrous. I spent 2 weeks trading emails diagnosing the problem. How about you send a replacement and a box for the old one? My advice to people looking at these; buy a cheap $125 version. They last the same amount of time. Toss is and buy another one. The name Dyson does not mean it's any better nor is the customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Small Muscles

customer_reviews.title: Dyson product not good
customer_reviews.text: I Purchase this item 4 month ago and the battery went bad i called the company Dyson to no avail couldn't work with me then they told me i must called Amazon who then pass the buck i recommend anyone not to purchase this item because you will lose your money and time
customer_reviews.author: Mic2

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Vacuum Cleaner. Stay away and save your $300 bucks.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this vacuum cleaner and it stopped working within 3 weeks of mild use. Bare minimum use, really. We actually have a cleaning service that comes weekly to clean the house, they bring their own equipment. We got this so we could use this to clean the baby's room to pick up cracker crumbs. Maybe clean the carpeted stairs mid-week (16 steps - counted!). We got 7 days usage from this unit. What a scam. Stay away. Buy a throw-away unit. Don't come near this garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Raj Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware The cord stops charging within a couple of months!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom and after 2 months the cord stopped charging. I thought Amazon would honor the return but it turns out it's only 1 month return time. Not knowing this would be such a hassle I purchased another as I'm returning the first. Now after 2 months the second Dyson V6 is doing the same thing and return time is up. They refer you back to Dyson and Dyson refers you back to Amazon! Still fighting for answers on the first purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this lightweight vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this vacuum! Having carpeted stairs is a blessing and a curse with 4 cats in the house. This vacuum makes it so easy to clean them. My only downside to this vacuum is you do need to empty the housing unit pretty frequently, as it is quite small. But it works great, charges quickly, and is light enough my kids can use it. We love cord free life and won't be returning any time soon.
customer_reviews.author: StayAtHomeMomdotcom

customer_reviews.title: Love it...love Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I really love this!! The cordless feature is what sells this product. It also works very well. Picks up all kinds of stuff plus some. I particularly like that it mounts on the wall and is easy to access when you need to use it. It also charges very fast and don't worry when you read that on the various powers that it only works 6 min on Max and 20 min on the lower setting. You can get a lot of coverage in 6 min and 20 min.
customer_reviews.author: Kwan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum for most tasks
customer_reviews.text: I've had this a few weeks and so far I'm pretty impressed and happy with it. The suction is a tad lower than I'd like but gets the job done for most clean ups. Of course, it has the 'max' option if you need the extra suction, but that quickly drains the battery. I live in a small flat (750 square feet) and can use this to clean the whole place. I only need to get out the big corded vacuum on rare occasions or for the deep cleaning tasks. Doubles nicely to clean furniture and get the cat hair out of my microfiber sofa. I can also take it to other places or my car for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This item is useless to me except for hard floors which it does ...
customer_reviews.text: did not work on my needlepoint rug, stopped and started incessantly, filter needed cleaned all the time. wrote, called company and no response. I want to return it for different model ( not so limited) but no response. This item is useless to me except for hard floors which it does beautifully for 20 minutes,
customer_reviews.author: Diane Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Battery Has Had To Be Replaced Twice
customer_reviews.text: Within a month of owning this unit I had to contact Dyson and get a new battery because it stopped turning on or charging, it would flash blue every time we tried to use it. Luckily it was covered under warranty so we didn't pay for the battery. New battery replaced under warranty worked great until 6 months in and it is having the same issue, blue flashing lights, won't charge, and will not turn on. Contacting Dyson yet again to try and get another battery. I would avoid this vacuum at all costs, much cheaper alternatives on the market that won't give you this many headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Mike M

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, Lightweight, Unrivaled Power
customer_reviews.text: This is the best investment I have made in the last two years. I absolutely love this vacuum. I was worried about the run time (20 minutes vs. 40 minutes) but I clean the same apartment faster since it is so easy to maneuver. Super lightweight. Functional, well designed access points for cleaning the filter, brushes, etc. Super quiet. This thing literally makes cleaning fun. I had a series 3 Dysom before this for over 15 years and used it to the day this one arrived. Excellent brand and excellent product that continues to improve per new generation.
customer_reviews.author: Evan L.

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum and it's more convenient than pulling out a full size model for daily running around my wood floors. I also use it as a mini hand vac many times. Two speeds for suction and the product is very well-made. Light weight so it would work for an elderly person as easily. The filter needs to be clean more often of course as it's just a small container. But I keep all my vacuum filters clean which keeps them in tiptop condition and that nasty smell doesn't build up from old debris sitting in the canister weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Lutz

customer_reviews.title: There is a MAX button on the back of the power handle and when it is lit runs on super power, thus draining the battery
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this vacuum in Nov 2016. Recently experienced problems with charging and running time. Called Dyson and walked me through a simple process. There is a MAX button on the back of the power handle and when it is lit runs on super power, thus draining the battery. I found the unit runs better on hardwood floors on MAX and carpet on regular. Back to loving it again!
customer_reviews.author: Alyce M

customer_reviews.title: EASY to use!
customer_reviews.text: OMG, I am so happy I bought this. I have serious back problems. I had a hard time using our vacuum, mainly trying to control the cord. So it was always left up to my husband, when he had time on weekends. I used it for the first time, now not only can I keep the carpets up between time, I also feel like I am contributing. It works great and so easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Puent

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terrible battery life, it last few minutes! We hate this thing, I'm looking the box to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Cesar Medina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: I've had this supposedly wonderful a vacuum for all of 7 months and already either the battery is going out or the motor is. It will start fine then it stops and starts every 2-3 seconds on and off on and off. I've had crappy cheap Bissell's and Electrolux vacuums that have lasted years. Then to top it off this one was sold without the serial number on it, so I couldn't register it with Dyson and it IS NOT certified re-furbished it was brand new or so I thought Beware of the company selling these things.
customer_reviews.author: kent jones

customer_reviews.title: Agile vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love these Dyson Vacs. Only downside is the compartment has to be emptied so often. It fills up fast, but that is of course, because it works so well. Can maneuver just about anywhere, and i use it as a 'handheld' as much as i do a stick vac. I even find myself 'dusting' with the dusting attachment as a handheld quite often. Versatile and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Jmbsol

customer_reviews.title: So Handy
customer_reviews.text: I just wish the battery lasted longer!! It's so light and easy to use, I end up using it for more than I planned on initially. Seems like the battery runs out so fast (20mins) If I had tried it out beforehand, I would have gone ahead and spent extra money on the larger model with the longer battery life. Great for quick cleanups, super easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Lemons

customer_reviews.title: The only cordless vacuum I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Just played with this vacuum for the first time. Works amazingly well. Ergonomics are impressive. Cleaning just got easier. Only last for about 15 minutes per charge, but can do a lot of damage in that time. Not intended to clean the whole house.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Earl Greer

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 3 months.
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum broke after 3 months and we are only a 2 person household with no pets. Doesn’t clean very well either. Purchased a new vacuum yesterday and it’s amazing the stuff the Dyson didn’t pick up... gross actually. Battery didn’t last very long either when on Max setting to deep clean carpets. Not very happy considering the price!!
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

customer_reviews.title: Great for hard surfaces!
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is fantastic for hard surfaces. If you have carpet or area rugs, you may want to get the corded one, since this one is best for your car and hard surfaces. Stay off the "max" button because it drains this battery within 6 minutes of continuous use. If you have a place with mostly carpet, choose the corded one.
customer_reviews.author: H

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as expected.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because a friend recommended it. However, I cannot use it more than 5 mins. It just quit on me again. I had a shark that was half the price and I gave it away once I got this, I would not give this away to anyone. It is terrible. Constantly quits and I have to empty it out and shake it around and then re plug it in hoping that it will work.
customer_reviews.author: Nana55

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed in the small capacity dirt container
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat disappointed in the small capacity dirt container.....have in-home dogs (3), cat (1), and a bird....got it exclusively for the downstairs, quick-pick-ups.....but, end up dumping the container 5 or 6 times! Did more research, check out the "Animal" model.....????? It's the same size, same suction, same dumping times.....costs $200.00 more.....Huh? Love it for what it is...what it does...but, more time consuming for my purpose. Maybe, I'll move into a duplex or small apartment someday....until then, I "swear" by my first, larger, more competent Dyson!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after two years
customer_reviews.text: Even thought this vacuum was amazing and worked very well. The motor stopped working after two years on the dot. For a $300 vacuum, I will expect it to last longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Ehab Aref

customer_reviews.title: It is great for quick spot cleaning and regular vacuuming
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. It is great for quick spot cleaning and regular vacuuming. My house is small & this is good for my size house. I have a long haired cat and it does a very good job picking up the cat hair. This little vacuum does a thorough job and I am sorry I didn't get one a long time ago. It's so convenient, I just take it off the wall and do a spot clean or a full job. I recommend this no-hassle vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Did not know this was refurbished!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could return it but after a 20% restocking fee and $20 shipping fee it wasn’t worth the hassle! Battery life is extremely short so it has to stay on the charger allll of the time! It’s louder than I expected... I thought the smaller size would be quieter but it’s just as loud as a normal vacuum...Do not buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebeca Lemes

customer_reviews.title: Only after 3 month it stopped working - Amazon not supplying any warranty
customer_reviews.text: Only after 3 month it stopped working. Since the seller was Amazon, I was expecting to have a warranty service from Amazon, instead I was redirected to manufacturer. After analyzing the problem "on-line" I was suggested to purchase replacement parts.... Big disappointment from AMAZON
customer_reviews.author: Ziv

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Vacuum stopped working after 7 months. I have cleaned it out well, cleaned the filter etc. I also can’t return it on Amazon. Disappointed because it should last longer than 7 months.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fulp

customer_reviews.title: I Love IT. It is so convenient and has great ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the "Cordless" part. I Love IT. It is so convenient and has great suction. The instructions say the charge is good for about 20 minutes, which is plenty of time to suck up all the German Shepard dog hair floating around on my floors. Wish the cup was a little bigger, but that's not a big deal. I also own an older Dyson that still works great. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: LStrick

customer_reviews.title: Quick and efficient
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Dyson as it is convenient to use. I use it to vacuum up behind my golden retriever as she is old and does a lot of shedding. Keeping her groomed helps a bit. I can just grab this vacuum without the hassle of dragging a chord around. The only down fall is that it doesn't hold a charge long. I have to use it quickly before the charge runs out. I like that I can do my stairs without having to pull and drag around the extra weight from my electric Dyson Vacuum. As far as suction power, it holds up to its name.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for quick and easy cleanups
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick and easy cleanups. When you live with at light colored dog, and have a dark carpet, you need all the help you can get and this is a great tool for those times when you don't have time to do a thorough job! Although with this machine you could do that, I just wanted a light weight, easy to use vacuum, works especially great to get the dog hair under the dining room table on the wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Gerhart

customer_reviews.title: Poor longevity and Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: My machine is 1 1/2 years old and the beater bar has quit working. Getting assistance from Dyson is useless. They do not listen to the problem and send me to YouTube vids that are meant for 5 year olds. I have repeatedly gone through their troubleshooting steps all to no avail. I might as well be talking to a wall. Will never buy a machine from Dyson.
customer_reviews.author: John Noble

customer_reviews.title: More trouble than it's worth!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this vacuum cleaner, but after 7 months of using it, I'm ready to toss this thing in the garbage!!! I love the lightweight and cordless aspects of it, but every freaking time I try to vacuum, it either dies shortly after I start using it (recharge is 3 1/2 hr wait) or it needs to be cleaned again...I spend more time recharging and cleaning this thing than actually using it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hollingsworth

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely Love this vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know this even existed until I saw it in a YouTube video a few weeks ago and immediately knew that I must have it. 3 days later (thanks to Amazon Prime) it was mine. The suction is fantastic for a battery powered vac. The price tag is a bit steep but you'll find nothing else on the market that's this lightweight with that much power. If I had to do it again I'd probably shell out another $100 for the Absolute as I really wish this model had a HEPA filter. I hit some pretty dusty areas in my basement and I could literally taste the dust in the air.
customer_reviews.author: JD451

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuume, short battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Ive been loving this vacuume!... until now, 10 months into owning it, it stopped charging. When I called Dyson they said the battery needed replacing for $95! and this was considered normal wear & tear, not covered under the warranty! Im SO mad! Considering the vacuume was $199.00, paying half that amount for a new battery after only 10 months is very disappointing. Beware this could be a problem for future buyers...
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Mailloux

customer_reviews.title: Best Vacuum I've Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: Been using for about two months. We're vegetarians and with all the food prep the kitchen floor is always a mess. This is perfect for quick use on any floor. I can do 2-3 rooms on one charge at high power. Low power is not very useful. Easy to store, quick to set up and use, easy to dump, super suction on high. One of the best $300 I've spent. We now have a clean kitchen floor every day.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Bayer

customer_reviews.title: I live in a small condo and this is perfect for our non-carpeted floors and stairs
customer_reviews.text: I live in a small condo and this is perfect for our non-carpeted floors and stairs. Detachable options for small spaces and enough suction to pick up dust, dirt and those awful palmetto bugs we have in Florida! it's just 'okay' on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: virtual

customer_reviews.title: light and effective - LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my mother for her 1 bedroom apt. The device only works for 20 minutes and then it needs to be recharged. However, its just the right amount of time needed to finish vacuuming all the rooms in her apt. This is light weights and it works excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Zambri

customer_reviews.title: Battery completely dead after 2 years.
customer_reviews.text: The battery completely died after 2 years, cost $40 for a replacement battery. I would not recommend. Good thing that dyson decided not to produce electric cars.
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Powerful little tool
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy cheap Vacuums and finally decided to go up a notch and the power and quality of this thing blew my mind. 10/10 won't go back. Very light to handle, easy charging and smooth yet powerful cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Shuang

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum this is my second one since my first one worked so well . Battery life isn’t amazing in these though.
customer_reviews.author: James Sheridan

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum - worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my review. I was happy at first, but this vacuum has turned out to be a waste of money. I'm on my second cleaner brush attachment - the roller continues to stop spinning, which makes the vacuum useless when vacuuming carpets. (Old review: I couldn't understand why people spent so much money on a vacuum cleaner - Dysons are so expensive. I get it now! This one is so easy to use - carpets and hardwood floors look great. Easy to maneuver in hard to reach spaces. I'm a believer.)
customer_reviews.author: SL

customer_reviews.title: Love this powerful vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Love this powerful vacuum! It is lightweight, which makes it easier to clean staircases. However, after two years of use, the motor on the floor brush and the brush itself do not work. I’ve done everything Dyson Support recommends doing and I’ve even cleaned it like various YouTube videos show to do. Nothing helps. Frustating that something that costs this much money doesn’t last longer. I expected a Dyson product to last longer. If my new one doesn’t last longer than two years, I will be changing brands.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Mechel Wisel

customer_reviews.title: Great cordless vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Dyson cordless vacuum because it is very easy to use you not worrying about having to plug it in and not being able to read spaces because the cord is too short. I love how they handle comes off the bottom and you can reach things that are highs like bugs on the ceiling. It is also very easy to clean out the canister and not have to worry about buying bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy C

customer_reviews.title: So good it makes using a vacuum fun
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing product, especially combined with the wall mount. I didn’t think using a vacuum could be fun! We have this mounted in our kitchen next to our fridge and use it multiple times per week.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great on my wood floors
customer_reviews.text: It sucks. In the good way. Nothing bad to say. Even when the battery inexplicably died, Dyson customer support was amazing and had a replacement battery delivered in 3 days.
customer_reviews.author: Sean E

customer_reviews.title: Weak charge
customer_reviews.text: Very practical, but this is only our 3rd summer using it (it's for a summer house) and a full charge gives us barely 10 minutes of vacuuming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS VACUUM
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS VACUUM!!! Gave my daughter my heavier vacuum as I wanted something cordless and easier with hardwood floors in a condo. So easy to use. Doesn't scratch my floors. Vacuums under anything. The hand unit portion is easy with only one attachment instead of 5..is all you need. Easy to empty. I swore I would never pay a lot for a vacuum...especially a cordless one. This one is worth every penny. I and I seldom have time to leave reviews. Do it!-
customer_reviews.author: LINDA H

customer_reviews.title: ideal for quick cleanups
customer_reviews.text: I live in a 1,200 sq ft condo and I can usually get through vacuuming my entire place on one charge- obviously with deeper cleaning jobs (i.e. couch/cushions, draperies) we have to charge it again, then resume our cleaning when it's fully recharged. Honestly, I love this vacuum- it's especially ideal for small spaces like mine where storage is limited. *UPDATE- the battery only lasts 2-3 minutes. Only use this vacuum for quick cleanups.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum rarely works. One out of about four times can I use it without it jamming or shutting off. I spend more time trying to unclog its various components and now the whole thing has stopped. I doubt I have used it more than 6 hours total. My blood pressure has not been improved by owning this very disappointing tool. A product this unreliable really should be taken off the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Leslie Takahashi Morris

customer_reviews.title: doesn't suck well, has my hair all stuck it in
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't work out for me, doesn't suck well, has my hair all stuck it in, its a real hassle. i don't recommend it to anyone who has dogs or people who lose hair easily. Wish I could return, but its been past the 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: This right here is a real game changer!
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite all time purchases. This thing is a game changer. Only vacum I intend to use, even through out my full size dyson, who wants to carry around a big heavy vacum that you have to plug and unplug constantly. I clean the house so much faster now. Just be aware that the battery life after charge is not very long. Its a downsize but everything in life has trade offs. Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Palacios

customer_reviews.title: Product is amazing. Even has held its ground with the dog hair.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. The cordless runs for quite a while and picks up most stuff. It does tend to get clogged in the brush head quickly, but between my golden retriever and me that’s not uncommon. Anything that doesn’t catch fire or almost catch fire after only three uses is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: NRohner

customer_reviews.title: Really great suction.
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum for my tile and wood floors. It works great on my carpeted stairs too. But it has so much suction that I can't use it on the regular carpet because I can't move it very far without getting tired out. I do like the charging station as it is always ready to go. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Metal Lady

customer_reviews.title: Dyson V6
customer_reviews.text: I live in an 1100 sq. ft. condo with mostly hardwood floors. I am able to vacuum my floors in less than 10 minutes. This includes the two carpeted bedrooms. I like the clear plastic dirt container. It shows me exactly what I've picked up. Even without the high speed ability, it does more than I expected. I would highly recommend this machine for persons in my situation.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Tortoriello

customer_reviews.title: Terrible battery life and hardly gets up the dirt off the floor.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this vacuum as most of our floors are hardwoods or tile, thinking this would save me a lot of time and help me maintain our floors. Nope! I can vacuum one room at the most, and the battery has to be charged! It also seems to just be pushing around the dirt instead of picking it up. So so disappointed in this especially the amount of money this is. Really needs to improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Amy B. Croker

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum. Love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome vacuum. Love it. Lots of pros, only cons were- no screws wall mounting kit for the vacuum wall mount and I let the vacuum charge all night and it doesn’t last that long of vacuuming on MAX. However, I would still purchase the vacuum again, it’s great for tile/hardwood floors versus a huge vacuum. If your vacuuming a huge area, his vacuum probably isn’t ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Wow, an amazing clean!
customer_reviews.text: We used to own a shark until it gave out about a month. I thought this would be about the same with a little extra power but it is a completely different cordless! It is incredible with the spills and messes it can clean up and the boost of power works very well. It works for long enough to get quickly around a house of about 1400sq ft before needing a recharge. Excellent if you want a cordless!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is is perfect for dusting surfaces / floors and vacuuming a few rugs in our 1000 square ft. home. One charge will allow us to clean most of the house (unless we're using the suction boost, which drains the battery quickly). We bought extra attachments, which turns this into an awesome duster. It's lightweight, versatile, packs away into a small box, and is kind of fun to use.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow Dyson is the best.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight easy to use great suction. No issues at all. I have mostly all hardwood floors in by home and lots of rugs this does the job and saves me so much time! Wonderful vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Msudoii

customer_reviews.title: Great suction
customer_reviews.text: Really works well but really only works for 20 minutes so you have to move fast....but suction is fantastic for a cordless. Totally worth the money if you only have a small space or you need something lightweight for stairs. I'm going to buy another one for my elderly mother to use on her stairs.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle I.

customer_reviews.title: Thank you Mr Dyson
customer_reviews.text: I own 4 dyson cordless products. I was a big shark fan in the past but dyson cordless has become the go-to cleaning product in my 2 homes and my RV. We have 3 small dogs and it is so easy to keep the household nice and clean. Amazing how much you can pick up and so quickly. It has all the power of a corded product.
customer_reviews.author: hjt777

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the stairs & small rooms or just a quick clean up. It's lightweight, versatile, easy to put together & use. Doesn't take hardly any space to store it. My only negatives-- the battery only lasts about 20 minutes, so while that charges back up I do other housework or take a break. And it's louder then other vacuums I've used. But it gets everything. So I'll deal with the noise.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Rickard

customer_reviews.title: Expensive trash
customer_reviews.text: Please save yourself and don’t buy this vacuum. I bought for my cabin and used it only a few times, Right away it wasn’t working and the finally it just stopped working completely . I tried to return it and they refused because the time had run out. I understand the timing but I wasn’t at my cabin all winter so I couldn’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: amazing to use
customer_reviews.text: amazing to use. so much better than my bulky vacuum I had previously. I was surprised at the amount of hair it took off the carpet
customer_reviews.author: charlie defoe

customer_reviews.title: I really like this little dyson
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little dyson. I have two dogs who shed a lot. I have all wood floors in my house and this has worked even better than a broom to lift all the hair and dirt from the floors and it's fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Power
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum I amazing. So light and easy to use. Easily gets under furniture and cleans better than my big bulky upright. I live in a small apartment and can vacuum everything on one charge with no loss of power.
customer_reviews.author: Ghostflite

customer_reviews.title: You cannot Break a Dyson-The parts are all rubber and easy to find!
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new cordless DysonV6 vacuum. I Have a Dyson D-14 animal vacuum that I have had over 10 yrs and it has never broke or had any problems with this wonderful vacuum. I just wanted a cordless for a Motor Home.
customer_reviews.author: kmorris1-San Antonio Tx

customer_reviews.title: LOTS OF POWER AND EVER SO HANDY TO USE!
customer_reviews.text: This Dyson V6 Cordless Vacuum is the best, grab and do a quick pick-up, I have ever owned. It has lots of power (unlike most cordless vacuums) and does hardwood floors, tile, carpeting easily. In fact it does everything my big Dyson canister vacuum does and more. It is amazing how much dust and dirt this vacuum picks up. I have two little short hair dogs and it does a fantastic job picking up their loose hair that seems to get all over the house. Way to go Dyson!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Parris

customer_reviews.title: Scratches my hardwoods
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for a little over a year and I'm just now starting to notice that it's scratching up my hardwood floors I don't know if the rollers are doing it or what and I'm not sure what to do about it.
customer_reviews.author: Dmpols

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and powerful.  Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Actually fun to use. A little pricey, but worth it. Lightweight but powerful. Easily adaptable for car vacuuming. This vacuum gets used almost daily while our older, conventional vacuum sat longer than it should have - waiting to get plugged in and hauled around the house. This is one labor-saving device that makes sense.
customer_reviews.author: Pepper

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Ok. But not the best for daily industrial use. Failed after one year of everyday use.
customer_reviews.author: kevin brown

customer_reviews.title: stopped working six months after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I've used this vacuum just twice a month for the past six months and it suddenly has stopped working. It's covered by warranty and I'm being sent a new battery which will hopefully fix the issue. But it's indicative of quality if the machine breaks in this way so soon after purchase. It's a good vacuum but I worry that it will be a hassle to maintain (calls to customer support and scheduling repairs) and extra cost after the warranty expires.
customer_reviews.author: mxn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum, very efficient but if you have a ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent vacuum, very efficient but if you have a high pile rug I would suggest to purchase something else, or you can just by the adapter kit which works just fine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my elderly mom
customer_reviews.text: She loves this vacuum. You can zip around and clean quickly..Perfect for dog hair.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy Dyson
customer_reviews.text: Battery stopped working after 8 months of light use. Called Dyson And they want $101 for a new battery. The two year warranty doesn't cover the battery! How ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Corbin

customer_reviews.title: but works great on my new wood floors
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but works great on my new wood floors. I even find myself cleaning more often because it is handy and easy to use and light. A little tricky emptying the bin, but that's a minor complaint. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

product_meta.title: Dyson V6 Cord-Free Stick Vacuum Cleaner, White
product_meta.description: Style:Cord-freeThe Dyson V6 cordless vacuum gives you Dyson suction power without the hassle of a cord. Suitable for use on all floor types. Dyson received the highest numerical score among stick vacuums in the J.D. Power 2017 Vacuum Satisfaction Study, based on 6,965 total responses from 7 companies measuring the opinions of consumers who purchased a stick vacuum in the previous 12 months surveyed in February-March 2017. Your experiences may vary.
feature_bullets: Cord free. Hassle free. Filtration: Washable lifetime filter. Suction power (MAX mode) : 100 AW
Up to 20 minutes of continuous suction. Trigger releases instantly. Battery power is only used for cleaning. Ergonomically designed

Motorized cleaner head cleans all floor types. Stiff nylon bristles remove ground in dirt from carpets. Carbon fiber filaments remove fine dust from hard floors. Bristles cover its full width, allowing edge to edge cleaning

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars1,752 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
specifications.Specific Uses For Product: Hard Floor, Multi-surface, Cordless, Hardwood, Carpet, Bagless
